Articles.Content:
When I first started uploading KSP vids I never thought I would get that many subscribers and I was very happy when I crossed the 100subs mark. Well I've just crossed the 2000subs mark and I'm over the Mun about it!! So Thank You all so much for your subs and your comments, its really been very inspiring. I'm very pleased to be part of this awesome and supportive community!!

I was hoping to have another vid ready to put out when I hit 2ksubs but I've not managed to get one done. But, I am working on something else which I hope will be a useful tool for you guys and I hope to have a version ready soon. I'm not saying anything more about it now thou!

Thanks again everyone!! I've loved every minute of my involvement with this community!

FRANK, the party club on the mun, Constellation...

You really deserve it.

Congrats. Well deserved.

Still think your Munclub was the best.

Your Constellation mission was a huge source of inspiration to me. It motivated me to take my KSP skills to a whole new level - I'd never thought I can fly such big, sophisticaded (complicated) ships/assemblies. So thank you katateochi!

Congratulations!

By now my MV has got... 363 Views?
no commentary on your vids eh? a shame, else I would be 2016.
Respect! I am not too bad with KSP, but the constellation mission... Don't you have a job or something? Brilliant!
The Contellation mission was my favorite. Well done!

surprisingly no one has mentioned the grand tour yet, it's a great mission (still waiting for you to complete it though )! but every video of yours is special, from the awesome craft designs, to the editing. keep it up!

Thanks Guys!

@bsalis - That's actually my fav one too.

@RealHogweed - I really got stuck on the editing of the last part of the GT mission, and then got totally side tracked by new KSP release and other stuff. I'm having difficulty editing it down to have the detail of what I did, yet not be ridiculously long. I'd also thought that as it was now an out of date version of KSP no-one would care about it, but I've had some comments/threats on youtube so I really need to get off my ass and finish it!! soz for the delay!

And EVERYONE; seriously check out Cesrate's KSP compilation vid, its really nicely edited and is a real feel good vid! Here's the link -

Thanks:)

I think, just let it be natural.
Just want to chime in that I thought your Constellation mission was amazing. Fantastic show of design, preparation, execution, contingency, and taste in music.

Constellation was amazing ... nice job on that! I can only imagine that your time investment into this project was no less than 250 hours.

Edited August 30, 2013 by Caelib

Dude, at your suggestion just watched your grand tour part one. Epic stuff. Would be great if one of these days you got setup to do commentary. I would love to hear what you have to say about these missions.
Congrats Kat , I have been hooked on your vids since the Duna Beetle Rover.

the constellation mission, WOW, My hardest ever (successfully) completed mission, was only 85% of that

That aside; well done!
